meta.title: Rouleur - Cycling Manager
meta.description: Rouleur is a cycling manager for the real cycling fan

og.title: Rouleur - Cycling Manager
og.description: Rouleur is a cycling manager for the real cycling fan
og.author: Tim Claes

hero_content: Prepare for the next cycling season and be ready by the Omloop Het Nieuwsblad!
team_overivew_content: Rouleur lets you create your squad, make strategic transfers, and use Powerups to outsmart the competition!
second_feature_content: Prove that you know more about cycling than your friends, all year round.
community_content: Compete with friends in Mini Leagues and connect with other cycling enthusiasts
mini_league: Mini League - it's more fun with friends
reason_content: Compete with friends in Mini Leagues and connect with other cycling enthusiasts
testimonial_content_1: Simply the best cycling manager app! The powerups are superb and add dynamics to the competition.
testimonial_content_3: I'm not playing any other cycling manager anymore, rouleur = ðŸ¤Ÿ
